index.activities: I build a lot of plugins, CLI tools and apps during my spare time. Mostly on JavaScript.
index.interested: Interested by my knowledge and skills? Maybe we can work
projects.title: Projects
projects.subTitle: Projects and plugins
projects.bsCustomFileInput: Plugin to make Bootstrap's 4 custom file input dynamic
projects.bsBreakpoints: A plugin which detects Bootstrap 4 breakpoints and emits an event when there's a breakpoint change
projects.bsCustomizer: Create a custom Bootstrap 4.x build by choosing the components and JavaScript plugins you need
projects.supportWorkInfo: You can read more about me and my open-source work on my
projects.donation: If you want to support my work you can make donations here
contact.info: If you want to contact me about job offers, projects or any questions, drop me an email.
experiences.ldlc1: Built a web app with Angular 7 for LDLC shops to sell and manage their stock
experiences.ldlc2: Developed a hybrid mobile app on Android and iOS with Ionic and Angular 7 to allow shops to do an inventory of their shop's stock
experiences.ldlc3: Embedded a web app inside a software thanks to Electron to allow this web app to communicate with a payment terminal
experiences.bootstrap1: Rewrite Bootstrap without jQuery in our v5
experiences.bootstrap2: Running our unit tests in differents browsers and smartphones thanks to
experiences.sii1: Carrefour: Worked on CARLA logistic suite
experiences.sii2: Orange Business: Worked on a software to manage room access for Orange
experiences.it1: Built an API to communicate with a native mobile app
experiences.it2: Worked on creating an HTML5 viewer to read PDF
services.mentorDescription: Do you want to learn new things or improve your skills, but you don't know how, or you need someone to show you how? That's what I can help you with! I'll be there for you to help and show you the way to improve your knowledge and achieve your goals.
services.engineeringDescription: Designing applications, building a website or a mobile application. I can help you to build your projects by providing a solution to your needs. Also I can share my experience as an IT consultant which will provide options to solve your problems.
services.trainingDescription: Sometimes you or your team have a lack of knowledge or you want to learn new things (a framework, new languages, etc...), I can provide training remotely, or if you're a company, directly at your office.
services.trainingExample3: How to write an API with Node.js
services.lastSentence1: If you are interested, or if you have any questions do not hesite to
services.lastSentence3: me to talk about your projects.
